messages.content: I've been your MP since 2015, working hard here and in London. I've helped thousands of people and taken up issues that matter to us all. I voted against Brexit, against Trident and against austerity. I've spoken about the climate emergency, pursued environmental issues and highlighted the poor record of the UK Government. I've made the case for fair pensions, the rights of EU citizens and support for our creative communities.

This election, though, is about Brexit and what comes next. The economic and cultural damage means that we can't accept it. Some say we need to "get Brexit done" and start the years of negotiating a trade relationship with the EU and trying to do deals with other countries. It wouldn't be "done", we'd just start another round.

We have the right to decide our own future; and I'll work to make that happen. A vote for me, a vote for the SNP, is a vote against Brexit and a vote to let Scotland decide her future. Give me your trust and your support, let me keep doing the job.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Voted against Brexit and believes in negotiating a trade relationship with the EU.
Voted against Trident and highlights the poor record of the UK Government on defence.
Spoken about the climate emergency, pursued environmental issues, and supports local environmental projects.
Made the case for fair pensions, rights of EU citizens, and support for creative communities.

issues.brexitEurope: Voted against Brexit. This election is about Brexit and what comes next.
issues.defence: Voted against Trident. Exposed the appalling safety record at the nuclear weapons bases on the Clyde and the MoD’s refusal to look after the explosives and chemical weapons it dumped in our seas.
issues.economy: The economic and cultural damage of Brexit means we can't accept it.
issues.environment: Spoken about the climate emergency, pursued environmental issues and highlighted the poor record of the UK Government on environmental issues. Supported local environmental projects.
issues.governance: We have the right to decide our own future.
issues.socialWelfare: Made the case for fair pensions.

community.content: I helped save the Leith Registrar; supported local environmental projects; and helped bring the film studio here. I'm working to solve the Airbnb problem.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helped thousands of people and taken up issues that matter to us all. Saved the Leith Registrar, supported local environmental projects, brought the film studio here, and working to solve the Airbnb problem.

quotes.text: The economic and cultural damage means we can't accept Brexit. We need to keep negotiating a trade relationship with the EU and trying to do deals with other countries.

examples: I got the UK farming minister to admit keeping Scotland's EU money and investigated Cambridge Analytica and AggregateIQ.
